::Dark Lavacons::

           Astral and the destructive gang had left the =
battle with Sharpedge, Jetstorm and everyone, and in 3 hours of quick flyin=
g, had arrived at ANOTHER battle between the Alliance and another group cal=
led the Mafia.
 
          The Dark Lavacons landed by Zardus.

         "D=
o you wish our service, Zardus?" Recklessa said, and the others cackled, ho=
ping for a big, fat, juicy YES FOR DESTRUCTION!!
